roleset.name: translating into a special system of marks/characters

role.descr: end state, system of notation, secondary pred on arg1/2

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: One aspect of Carter's notation in the Double Concerto that has excited considerable controversy is his notation of quintuplet and septuplet subdivisions of beats - often termed non-duple, "artificial" or "irrational" subdivisions.
example.arg: of quintuplet and septuplet subdivisions of beats - often termed non-duple, "artificial" or "irrational" subdivisions

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WordNet, notate-v.01. No VNcls.

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: They were used originally to distinguish polyphony and its notation from plainchant.
